item.title: UN's top court says Israel obliged to allow UN aid into Gaza
item.description: The court also says Israel has not substantiated its allegations against the UN agency for Palestinian refugees.

item.title: UN's top court says Israel obliged to allow UN aid into Gaza
item.description: The court also says Israel has not substantiated its allegations against the UN agency for Palestinian refugees.

item.title: SpaceX says it has cut Starlink services to Myanmar scam camps
item.description: Campaigners say Starlink technology has enabled crime syndicates to operate from locations along the Thai-Myanmar border.

item.title: Eight pupils suspended after video shows assault at South African school
item.description: The mother of one of the assault victims says he is a cancer survivor, according to reports.

item.title: Dozens killed in Nigeria fuel tanker explosion
item.description: People rushed to collect fuel from the overturned tanker when it suddenly exploded, engulfing them in flames.
